medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports that her pain began one day prior to admission and was characterized by an episode of right-sided pain radiating to the back, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea for 1 day. She felt back to normal until symptoms recurred; no fevers reported during this time. Pain was noted as 4 out of 10 at evaluation, with additional constant achy pain in the epigastrium that began that morning.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Coronary artery disease status post stenting, tracheal stenosis complicated by recurrent stenosis requiring frequent bronchoscopy, hypertension
medical_history.family_history: Father with esophageal cancer, mother with COPD
